pageProps.content:
You probably know that the semantic `` tag can be used to display a date or time. It's recommended to use it with the `datetime` attribute which brings some benefits: - Search engines produce better results - It can be used by some devices allowing you to add a reminder or calendar event easily ```html
The meeting will start at 09:00
The meeting will start at 09:00
```
